page.title: 11Stephen Hospital.
page.content: Stephen Hospital is situated at the corner of Mount Crescennt and Stephen Avenue.It was founded in 1886.Lord Mount Stephen,of Canadian Pacific Railway,donated money to help establish and equip the hospital.At present the hospital has 23 nursing staff and 15 other staff.There are 2 doctors,Dr Cunningham and Dr Hennaghan.There 8 wards which provide 23 beds.The hospital has an 'accident and emergency'department.Ajoining the hospital is the Health Centre.A dental surgery is held there every Monday. Stephen Hospital no longer has a maternity department although it did have until 1979.Patients who require any major surgery go to either Dr Gray's in Elgin or Forresterhill in ABerdeen.
